message.body: Hey Atlanta
What's going on today
Hi there! Happy weds!
Thanks you too.
Are you working today
I am. But lucky for me, I get to work from home on Weds. How about you?
I'm at the office but getting out early today to go see a MLS soccer game
What do you do for a living
I'm an epidemiologist work for CDC. You?
I work doing a lot of stuff, art and linguistics mostly. Is your job scary ?
Ha! Not in the least. I really am more of an office worker. I don't get to run out and fight outbreaks
I would think just being reminded that there could be a outbreak everyday would be stressfull.
What do you do in your free time?
Oh there are numerous outbreaks everyday! I guess you just do what you can to prevent the big ones
I like to travel and love live music. You?
I like to go to soccer games, bike riding, make art , read.
I like to go see music shows too
Mostly just friends bands
What are you reading now?
Taras Bulba by Gogol
Enjoying it?
Yeah it's the last story in a book of go Gogol s short stories so I'm kind of ready to read something more contemporary now
Have you read anything good lately
I'm currently reading an autobiography about The Band by Levon Helm. It's great
Are you a fan of 70s rock
I am! You?
Sure some of it is pretty great. Other than the Band what 70s bands are you into
Love Dylan. The who. Zeppelin
The who is always great. I love the band Love with Arthur Lee too
Also deep purple was great at times
I have a lot of that stuff on vinyl
Oh yes! I also like the Dead but I'm not a total deadhead. I have a ton of vinyl too! Just scored like 5 used Elvis Costello albums last week. It was suc
h a find!
That's great, are there many record stores where u live or do u pick up records from garage sales mostly
We have a few good shops here but I got these at this massive record store in Baltimore. So many good things!!!
I also found a used copy of one of my favorite albums by Dawrs
Dawes
I used to live in Baltimore, it was when I started collecting vinyl.
Was it sound garden by anyca
Sorry
Was the store called sound garden?
Yesssss! That's awesome. I was blown away by the selection. It was in Fells Point. Big store
Yeah I bought alot of records there when I lived in bmore
It's a good record store
What were u doing in bmore
I was visiting a friend who just moved up there. I really enjoyed the city. Has a ton of charm :)
It's nickname was "charm city" for a while
Yeah that's why I said it that way :)
I think it's motto now is" the best city in America" which is not as fitting
When I lived there the motto was "the city that reads" and then they changed it to just "believe".
They keep sliding downhill with the mottos
Did you go anywhere else cool in bmore
I did the pirate cruise! It was hilarious and very drunken. I also hit up as many dive bars as I could find. I love dive bars
Baltimore has a lot of dive bars!
Sounds like a fun trip!
You said u like to travel, where else have you been recently?
It was a blast! My nutty friend just bought a houseboat to live on!
I'm headed out to Chicago on Friday, but last trip was to Tulum, Mexico back in March. So lovely!
That sounds awesome... U nless u like to listen to records.
I really want to go to Mexico
I have a friend that lives in Mexico City
Tulum was amazing. Very calm, Eco friendly, and not gobbled up by the tourism industry
What did you do in Mexico
Was the food great?
Sunbathed, ate interesting foods from roadside taco stands, visited the Tulum ruins, snorkeled with sea turtles!
Yes! So amazing!
I love tacos and ceviche was very abundant.
I want to do all those things! Can you take me with you next time you go? :)
Yes!!!! Of course! :)
I feel like going on a trip with would be a root
Riot! Not root
Last trip I took was to Baltimore too but it was for a wedding so I didn't do much else
I do like to have fun wherever and whenever I can
Me too I just don't get a ton of opportunities
You travel in Europe much
I do! Once a year I go over. Last year was Spain. Haven't decided where this year. Any suggestions
Lisbon or the south of France
My friend said Montenegro was nice
Ooooh! I did enjoy watching the Montenegro polo team during the Olympics
I had one of the nicest times perched in an old 16 century stable masters cottage overlooking the Irish Sea in the summer
I missed that, we're they good?
Sounds divine
I went to school in London and have some family and friends there so I like to go there when I'm in Europe
I'm obsessed with the UK! Lived in Nottingham for a summer
Two of my best friends are from Nottingham ! Go Forrest
I have to go to the soccer game in a sec. Add me as a partner on your account and we can chat more about England
Yay!!!!! I loved it there!
